Literature.Title: Discovery of an ultra-short linear antibacterial tetrapeptide with anti-MRSA activity from a structure-activity relationship study.
Literature.Author: Lau QY, Ng FM, Cheong JW, Yap YY, Tan YY, Jureen R, Hill J, Chia CS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus K739(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700699(MIC=6.25µM)
